name: Color Switch (itch) (NaveenPrasadGames)
description:
Color Switch is a 2 player class project for Console Game Development I at George Brown College.

It was meant to showcase the standards of a AAA game such as splash screens, active controller screen, menus etc.

This is a Solo project developed in Unreal Engine 4 with C++.

The game shows both players different colors on the screen and they must match the color with the gamepad button color. If they do, they get a point. When the timer runs out, player with the most points wins!
